system.availability:
When making a Toughness Test due to a Critical Effect, wearer can use Willpower Characteristic in place of Toughness.
Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks Like a platinum cross with gold inlay.
system.cost: Distinguished Service Medal: Slaying a Powerful Dark Eldar Warrior, such as an Archon, Succubus, Haemonculus, or Incubus in melee combat.
